data.title: Kansas City Power & Light District
meta_keywords: live country music concert series in kansas city
data.text:
Miller Lite Hot Country Nights, presented by Midwest Ford Dealers is back, bringing renowned country artists every Thursday to KC Live! Check out the 2024 lineup below.

We can't wait to see you this summer at KC Live! in the Power & Light District!

2024 ARTIST LINE-UP

June 6 – Treaty Oak Revival*

June 13 – Niko Moon*

June 20 – Warren Zeiders

June 27 – Pecos & The Rooftops*

July 4 – Tyler Booth*

July 11 – Mitchell Tenpenny

July 18 – Randall King*

July 25 – Larry Fleet

August 1 – Alexandra Kay*

August 8 – Conner Smith*

August 15 – Easton Corbin*

August 22 – Travis Denning*

*General admission is free for guests 21 and older on events marked with an asterisk. Guests aged 13-20 will be subject to a cover charge at the door.

AGE RESTRICTIONS

Guests under 18 must be accompanied by a parent or guardian.

No guests under 21 will be allowed entry after 8 pm.

TICKETS

General Admission

Includes admission to the show. Stand room only.

PNC Patio

Includes exclusive access to an elevated viewing deck with a private bar in the center of KC Live!, plus expedited concert entry. Must be 21+.

The Deep Eddy Mezz Terrace

Includes exclusive access to the second-level viewing area in front of Shark Bar's Patio, two drink tickets (good for Miller Lite, Coors Light, craft beer, select premium cocktails and non-alcoholic beverages), and expedited concert entry. Must be 21+.

ADD-ONS

PBR Party Starter

PBR Party Starter gets the party started before the show at PBR Big Sky! Include an all-inclusive drink package (domestic draft beer and call cocktails) in PBR Big Sky from 6-8 pm and cover all night with expedited re-entry to PBR Big Sky after the concert. Add on to any ticket or purchase on its own. Must be 21+.

VIP Experience

Includes an all-inclusive drink package (Miller Lite, Coors Light, craft beer and select premium cocktails) valid at the VIP Lounge from 6-9 pm, exclusive access to the VIP Lounge featuring restrooms, seating, dedicated bar, complimentary snacks, and expedited entry. Must be 21+.

PATIO TABLE RESERVATIONS

Enjoy the best views in the house on Guy Fieri's patio with a personal server, VIP entrance into the show & your own seated area apart from the rest of the crowd.

***These are booking fast! Don't wait!***

For table reservations, please email ovozar@kansascitylive.com.

PNC FASTLANE

Here’s a perk for being a PNC Bank Cardholder!

For all Kansas City Live! concerts look for the PNC FASTLANE at the northwest entrance and get in faster before doors open to all other fans by showing your PNC Bank Card. All patrons in your party must be a PNC Bank Cardholder to use this entrance together.

Not a PNC Bank Cardholder? Visit our Crossroads Solution Center at 1837 Grand Blvd, Kansas City, MO or online at PNC Personal Banking
